project_descr: Support to UN RC/HC functions in the South Sudan.

outputs.output_title: Support to UN RC/HC in S.Sudan
outputs.output_descr:
The Resident Coordinator/Humanitarian Coordinator, is in charge of numerous actions that require integration and coordination between the Mission and the UN Country Team. This Section in UNMISS is responsible for liaison with the UN Country Team, under functions captured by the Resident Coordinator’s Support Office (RCSO).
In the past two years, the RCSO’s main priorities have been to establish coherent basic coordination structures, extend its presence through the deployment of RRP UNMISS staffs into each of the 10 States to respond to humanitarian emergencies (in the absence of state-level O
